resources.string: ConfirmU is a credit score provider…
Please enter your full name. It should contain name and surname.
Btw, if you click a circle with your initials, you may choose a profile pic
Do you want to add AadHar info?
No account? Don\'t worry! Let\'s enter info manually
How many kids do you have?
Can you please tell us your job specific skills? click me to add details
Tell us what you do for living?
Do you want to add another job?
Your current ConfirmU score is listed below - we recommend you connect additional social accounts and upload incremental data so we can calculate your score again.
It may not help prevoious application but will surely help you nest time.
